name: Register Revenge (Ludum Dare 44)
description:
A game made for Ludum dare 44.  Theme - Currency is your Life.

You are a cash register come to life, that is avenging his town's recent robbery.

Arrow keys to move and jump and Space to shoot out your coins.

This is my second time in the game Jam but first as a programmer, and boy was it a challenge even for this. Spent more time trying to get the code to work than anything else, so only got three levels in time :( Only managing to get some stuff working 5 minutes from deadline

This was my girlfriends first attempt at digital and game art too. 

"That was a great experience. Of course the difficulties found their way. Definitely with more time and experience we could've done better. But there is more room left for improvement for the next Jam!" 

ChangeLog:

- Fixed game breaking restart bug (Caused game to be unplayable on restart)

 - Fixed falling platforms not going to original position (caused Level 3 to be unplayable after a death)

 - Fixed  game breaking checkpoint in level 2 (caused game to be unplayable after a death in level 2)

- Added Screenshots and more info to game page
